intro: Survive intense firefights and claim victory.
description:
Battle Pixel is an intense first-person shooter where every match becomes a fierce battle for the top spot. You’ll enter a combat zone where there’s no room for error — only those who think fast, shoot precisely, and move smartly will come out on top.

Features:
• Access a wide arsenal. Weapons can be purchased by collecting resources during or between matches. Each type has its own role — build the perfect loadout for any situation.
• Compete against real players. Online battles demand maximum focus and flexibility. Every decision could change the tide of combat.
• Want to train or test new weapons? Fight against bots in offline mode — a great opportunity to sharpen your reflexes and experiment with tactics.
• Step outside the active zone and you’ll start taking damage. A constantly shrinking boundary pushes players forward, forcing fast decisions and aggressive plays.
• Use vehicles for fast travel and surprise attacks. Cars can be a lifesaver — or a liability — depending on who’s in control.
• Customize your style. Unlock and apply unique skins for both weapons and your character — dominate the battlefield with power and flair.

Battle Pixel is a survival arena where only the strongest prevail. Are you ready to enter the fight and prove your dominance?
